description: Read more about Congress observes 'Save Democracy Day' in Mumbai on Business Standard. The Maharashtra and Mumbai Congress on Friday organised a 'Save Democracy Day' at the Azad Maidan here to protest against the political developments in neighbouring Karnataka.
title: Congress observes 'Save Democracy Day' in Mumbai
